attributes.action: We the undersigned call upon HM Government to adhere to the wishes of the people
attributes.additional_details: Recently those opposed to this will and our freedom to choose, set up a petition calling for a change in the rules and then a proposed second referendum in order to supersede the voice of the people. Therefore we the undersigned call upon HM Government to adhere to the wishes of the people, to carry through the peoples desire to leave the supranational entity known as the EU and to prevent those who wish to quiet the voice of freedom from doing so.
attributes.background: The EU referendum held recently showed that the majority of people of all political persuasions, ages, races & genders wanted to leave the European Union, this is an unequivocal desire voiced by some 17,410,742 people.
